Hot-air ballooning

Ballon Château d'Oex / Sky Event SA

Château-d’Oex

Alpine and Valley flights

Ballon Château-d’Oex / Sky Event SA
Chemin des Ballons 2
1660 Château-d’Oex
tel. +41 (0)26 924 22 20

Maurice Sottas - Hot-air ballooning

Pringy

Hot-air ballooning

Maurice Sottas
1663 Pringy
tel. +41 (0)79 230 21 86

Easyballoon - Hot-air ballooning

Sorens

Hot-air ballooning from La Gruyère, Fribourg and Romont.

Impasse de la Croix 19
1642 Sorens
tel. +41 (0)79 651 81 19

Aventure Gruyère - Hot-air balloning

Corbières

Hot-air ballooning for 1 to 45 people

Aventure Gruyère
Chemin des Planches 18
1647 Corbières
tel. +41 (0)78 725 76 19

Gruyère Escapade - Hot-air balloon!

Le Pâquier

Discover La Gruyère from a hot-air balloon!
Professional pilot. Insurance included.
All year round, 1h30 flight, 3-4 hours for the whole activity

Gruyère Escapade
Chemin de Bois Riant 1
1661 Le Pâquier
tel. +41 (0)26 921 39 94
